1.title: Premiere

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Ex on the Beach is the Swedish version of the British reality television show of the same name. single men and women enjoying a summer holiday in paradise while looking for love. However, they are joined by their exes to shake things up. Each ex is there either for revenge or to rekindle their love.

1.title: The party and flirting can begin

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Our eight party-blowing singles arrive at the luxury villa in Anguilla. The party and the flirting start right away, and it is urgent for the participants to create strong relationships. For anytime, an ex can get out of the water and change everything.

2.title: Chaos when the first ex appears

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Eight singles travel to a luxury villa on one of the Caribbean's most luxurious islands, Anguilla, to party, flirt and seek romance. They have barely got to know each other until their ex, one by one, literally climbs out of the water and takes place.

3.title: Double ex and adult mat on the couch

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: A new ex appears on the beach and it turns out that the person has been with more than just one in the house. Two camps are created and the atmosphere is tense. Then make another ex entrance which means that one of the girls gets hard to restrain their feelings.

4.title: Sanning eller paddan spårar ur

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Love sprouts in the Caribbean. Two of the participants who flirted wildly finally get to it with each other. But everything is not just love in paradise. One of the exes continues to create drama in the house and awakens the blood of the other participants. Everything is put on its tip in the evening when it's time for truth or toad.

5.title: Adde och Joey sår onda frön

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Just creating a little drama doesn't seem to be enough for one of the ex. He sits on a dark secret that he plans to release as a bomb. At the same time, a new triangle drama is being developed.

6.title: Vem är det som kryddar på elden?

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: The participants' already fragile relationships are basically shaken when another example comes to the Caribbean and immediately there is more trouble in paradise. Who chooses who, who throws plans against whom and who spices on the fire?

7.title: Skämtet som får Ida att gråta

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: One of the participants promises to become a new person after a lot of trouble. But is that enough? A participant is shocked by the message that they must leave Paradise immediately. An additional ex arrives, and a prank during the evening gets unprecedented and serious consequences.

8.title: Lil Jäz flippar ur

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Another ex arrives and sparks are already spreading on arrival. But what happens when another in their past realizes what is happening? One of the participants is trying to repair a relationship that was severely damaged during a break at yesterday's party.

9.title: En in två ut

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: A budding romance crackles in the joints when an ex climbs out of the waves. One of the participants gets one of the most difficult assignments so far - to send home one of the new friends. Several triangle drama is developed when the new ex comes closer to the group.

10.title: Addes triangeldrama

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Another triangle drama sails up after a flirt has begun between the newly arrived ex and one of the guys. Something that is not seen with the gentle eyes of the girl he already got it together with. When a new ex arrives then the situation becomes even more confused.

11.title: Två nya deltagare

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Two of the participants spend more time together, making one of the girls mad. The toad announces that one of the guys is doing their last night in the house, and the farewell party becomes something out of the ordinary. But the next morning, two new participants arrive.

12.title: Allvarligt kärlekstrubbel

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: A seemingly innocent lap dance leads to serious love for one of the strongest couples in the house. Two of the girls agree to play the other participants an innocent poop, but everything goes wrong and they get the whole group against them.

13.title: En bomb i huset

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: The toad orders two of the newest participants to immediately send home two people. The message turns down like a bomb in the house, and the smoke has barely settled before another example comes. And who the ex is, and who, gets one of the guys to start a war.

14.title: Triangeldrama deluxe

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: Two participants confront one of the girls. Who is she really interested in? The confrontation leads to a painful outbreak. At the same time yet another ex arrives, and the season's most exciting triangular drama to date is beginning.

15.title: Adde hamnar i hetluften

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: Eight singles travel to a luxury villa on one of the Caribbean's most luxurious islands, Anguilla, to party, flirt and seek romance. They have barely got to know each other until their ex, one by one, literally climbs out of the water and takes place.

16.title: Strandfest med extra allt

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: A new ex for one of the guys shows up, which causes two of the girls to cling to the guy in question. At the bonfire party that evening, two of the participants have unusually difficult to keep their fingers in control.

17.title: Paddan får en att lämna

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: Participants play the toad's dark play which traces the total. Brawls occur on several fronts, which eventually causes one of the participants to give up and go home.

18.title: Den motvilliga dejtaren

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: The latest triangle drama continues with unabated strength. But now it seems that the rest of the group has had enough of all the drama and a confrontation is approaching. At the same time, two of the participants are reluctantly going to date.

19.title: Sushisex

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: One of the girls is assigned to send home one of the exes. On the menu for the evening, sushisex and rumors say that an already home-sent participant will make a comeback. At the same time another example appears and touches on the situation even more.

20.title: Japp eller inte japp för Ida?

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: One of the girls seems very interested in the new ex. It is not liked at all by the guy she strolled with before. Another example comes out of the waves and the evening's pirate party gets lost.

21.title: Äntligen japp!

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: Two of the guys get together after one of them gossiped for the girls about a secret note. Two participants finally get each other extra close and everyone in the house goes on a common boat date.

22.title: Elins kärleksdilemma

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: One of the guys is forced to leave paradise and shortly thereafter another ex appears, which makes one of the guys unexpectedly shaken. Elin and Nenad's love story takes an unexpected twist.

23.title: Hampus japp napp

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

23.plot: One of the girls may leave the house in the morning. Three of the participants go on a hotel date. One of the guys should choose which of the others he should spend the night with at a luxury hotel. When the other participants know his choices, one of them becomes very nervous and angry.

24.title: Sista dagen i Karibien

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

24.plot: It is the last day in the Caribbean and two participants are allowed to leave the house in the morning. The others go on dates and think back to everything fun, crazy and hard that happened during their time in paradise.

1.title: Åtta singlar på Mauritius

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Participants arrive on the beach for the first time. They have no more than present themselves before the first ex is entering. And of course there will be chaos and great jealousy already the first evening.

2.title: Deltagarna delas upp i två läger

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Yesterday's noise continues and leads to the participants being divided into two camps. The atmosphere is tense in the house and it does not become calmer when another ex suddenly climbs out of the sea.

3.title: Flörtar för mycket

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: One of the girls is facing the wall because the others mean that she flirts too much with all the guys. She herself is unfamiliar with the allegations, which leads to conflict. At the same time, one of the guys struggles to court two of the girls - at the same time.

4.title: En gammal flört vaknar till liv

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Two of the participants who have already looked at each other in stealth may go on their first date. Two of the guys go to the beach to meet an ex, but what meets them there confuses them both. An old flirt awakens to life during the evening, ending in tears.

5.title: Säsongens första "Sanning eller Paddan"

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: The latest ex is being dissected by its former flirt but immediately finds a new one. In the season's first "Truth or toad" it immediately becomes chaos and a very dramatic triangle drama develops.

6.title: Ett nytt ex anländer

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: A budding romance is threatened by a new ex. The guy in question slits between the two girls, which means that they put him against the wall. Who will he choose? And one of the girls has begun to disturb themselves to two others' too friendly relationship.

7.title: Triangeldramat trappas upp rejält

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Two of the participants have been struggling all night and in the end it cuts completely. The evening's party has the theme "The Game", after the mentioned book about picking with the same name. A triangle drama escalates considerably, and yet another ex appears on the beach.

8.title: En deltagare måste lämna

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Triangular drama from yesterday continues, but the guy involved blues at everything. The toad announces that another participant must leave, which shocks everyone. At the same time, a completely different triangle drama begins to play.

9.title: Intriger och dubbelspel

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Two of the participants get it together considerably after the last participant had to leave. A new ex appears. Exet knows three of the other participants, and soon the intrigues and double games are in full swing. Everything leads to an emotional world war.

10.title: Bråk och nyfunna par

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: The noise from the day before hangs for some of the participants, but for two newfound pairs, the opposite is true of fractions. However, the fact that two of them get to it on a camping day causes a third party to feel the betrayal.

11.title: Två deltagare ryker ihop rejält

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Two of the participants get together considerably. Three of the participants help a fourth in a very intimate way, and a fiery new ex comes out of the waves.

12.title: Husets senaste triangeldrama fortsätter

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: The house's latest triangle drama continues. Later in the evening, the participants are divided into two camps, and the festivities end with one of the girls receiving all the other girls against them.

13.title: Någon vill avsluta en pågående flirt

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: One of the guys wants to finish an ongoing flirt, which leads to trouble. At the same time, another girl is interested, but the question is only if the new flirt is answered.

14.title: Superhjältefest och heta känslor

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: A new ex emerges that turns out to have been with both the participants and been associated with another participant's best friend. In the evening it is a superhero party and the feelings become hot. A participant is forced to leave the house.

15.title: En av deltagarna bryter ihop

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: Another participant is forced to go home and one of the girls gets very sad. A new ex comes in, which causes one of the participants to collapse in total.

16.title: Hätsk diskussion uppstår

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: The latest major triangle drama continues with unabated strength and soon reaches its peak. Fierce discussion arises during "Truth or toad". Antonija and Jack open up their feelings, and a new ex comes in and creates uncertainty in the group.

17.title: 80-talstema med quiz

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: A new ex slides in and twists one of the girls' attention in front of the eyes of two of the guys, which creates irritation and trouble. In the evening, the 80's theme is quiz. But the good mood is changed when the toad comes with very bad news.

18.title: Deltagarna tvingas välja

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: The participants are forced to choose which ones to leave the house. A new ex comes up on the beach and immediately takes pleasure for two of the participants at the same time.

19.title: Deltagarna får gå på gruppdejt

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: Participants may go on a group date. Two people get together a lot during a round of "Spinning the bottle", and one of the ex must suddenly leave the others.

20.title: Ett prank leder till bråk i gruppen

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: In the evening it is military and it will not be unexpectedly conflicts when one should give all other orders. A nasty prank later leads to fractions in the group.

21.title: Ett nytt ex med oväntade kopplingar

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: A new ex appears that turns out to have as unexpected as unusual connections to another in the gang. Dramat is no less because the new ex already gets it together that evening with someone whom another participant had a good eye on.

22.title: Ett födelsedagsfirande spårar ur

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: A birthday party tracks out and participants get together to the right and left. As the ex is flowing out of the sea, the friction increases dramatically in the house.

23.title: Fest med sagotema

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

23.plot: The participants have a party with the fairytale. One of the house's couple chews, but soon gets together and celebrates in their own way - a little everywhere - The participants have a group date on the beach and the toad announces that many of them must leave already the following morning.

24.title: Säsongsavslutning!

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

24.plot: It is time for a last "truth or toad", but this time it is the toad itself that asks the questions. Several fractions occur during the day, and everyone thinks back on the holiday that has gone and what has been best - and worst.

1.title: Åtta heta singlar i ett lyxigt strandhus

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Eight singles move into a luxurious beach house in the Bahamas, and already the first evening, emotions are bubbling. One of the guys gets into trouble when he hooks up with two girls at the same time. Two others hang loose and the atmosphere is at its peak when suddenly .

2.title: Exen berättar allt

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Who flirted with who - really? What happened after the trouble? What did the participants know about each other, and how is their relationship today? Program leader Carolina Gynning, with firm and warm hand, leads the participants through the latest events and emotional storms and does not weigh on the difficult issues.

3.title: Hemligt fulspel leder till rejält kaos

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: In the morning one of the guys' exes comes out of the water. The girl that evening before hanging with the guy in question becomes worried, and there seems to be good reasons for it. A secret fulplay leads to considerable chaos when it is revealed.

4.title: Exen berättar allt

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: The participants discuss Tristan's actions after Cassandra has entered the house. How many times did he actually kiss Cassandra, and has he been really honest with me? There will be hot emotions in the studio when clips not shown before are played.

5.title: Ett nytt ex stormar in

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Two couples have already been formed in the house. But will it last? A new ex comes up, and it turns out that they had put it together with two of the girls in the house. The new ex storms in and manages with the piece of art to both neck and argue with all the girls.

6.title: Exen berättar allt

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: The evening's events in Ex on the Beach are bumped and soaked with the participants, and no clips shown early are picked up. Who exactly is Ex on the Beach's alfahane? The participants discuss the ex-Kevin's entrance into the house in the Bahamas, when he hanged with all the girls and teased some. Kevin himself thinks he was partying and had fun, but some of the participants didn't really agree.

7.title: Ett av husets par byter ringar

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: The new ex is moving hot emotions. A couple seems to have been formed and the other participants think that it is a little very honeymoon over the situation. Not least when they fall in love with two change rings. One participant must leave the Bahamas.

8.title: Exen berättar allt

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: A controversial kiss is analyzed in detail and displayed in slow motion so that everyone involved once and for all should see what really happened. Never before shown extras are shown and everyone is not quite comfortable with the truths that come out. One of the girls feels the betrayal and becomes sad.

9.title: Bråken brakar loss

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Participants dance, neck and have fun. But one of the girls wants more drama and gets what she wants when she starts a wild discussion. The night's "hummelihummeli" in one of the beds is reviewed. A new ex appears and then the troubles break.

10.title: Exen berättar allt

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: The guy who did not recognize his ex when she made entrance may be responsible for her behavior. And the rating of the sex in the house comes up for discussion. A bromance runs the risk of running out of a previously unknown clip.

11.title: En veteran gör entré

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: The toad plunges directly, and the two participants set off on an unexpected date. An Ex on the beach veteran makes entrance - with large-scale plans and cocky attitude. The girls are tired of the guys rushing for the new supplement and the party is degenerating in screams and fights. The next day, another ex appears on the beach.

12.title: Exen berättar allt

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: The new ex, Johannes, talks about the little special welcome he received when he entered the program as Ex on the beach veteran. The rating scale for sex is once again the subject of discussion, and the participants talk about how it really feels to see themselves having sex on television.

13.title: Ett bekant ansikte med flera ex dyker upp

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: A familiar face pops up and the nerves are in full swing because she has more than one ex in the house. It is trouble in paradise for the gang's love couple. The participants have a costume party with the animal theme, but the party atmosphere comes off when the toad plings.

14.title: Exen berättar allt

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: A wild noise between two of the guys is raised and they both get a chance to explain what it was that made them so angry. The girls who suddenly got away from the guys they liked explain how they thought and what it was about. One of them regrets deeply, as it led to a boring breakup. The mood in the studio becomes immense when a participant suddenly comes with charges against another.

15.title: Uppbrottens tid i huset

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: It is the time of the breakup in the house. Two participants must leave the Bahamas immediately. A love couple ends, and a couple of couples break their friendship. One ex appears on the beach and raises the mood. The party ends with unexpected pairings in the bedrooms.

16.title: Exen berättar allt

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: The love couple's sudden and heartbreaking breakup nails faint. What was it that really happened when they both became so wounded? There are upset feelings in the studio when the participants discuss right and wrong. The new ex tells about the necklace that happened when he was welcomed into the house.

17.title: Tårar, skrik och heta känslor

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: The atmosphere is tense in the house after the loving couple's exhausting break-up, and the thing doesn't get any better because the guy has already found a new girl. Intrigues flare up and there will be Drama on the Beach with tears, screams and hot emotions as truths crawl.

18.title: Exen berättar allt

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: One of the girls got her heart broken when the guy she liked shared bed with someone else. The wounded emotions were expressed in a huge noise. The gang gets to find out what happened and if someone really did something wrong. Carolina Gynning is amazed at the participants' actions in a previously never shown clip.

19.title: Piratfest med en oväntad twist

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: Two of the participants learn something about aphrodisiacs, and the wounded hearts slowly but surely begin to heal. A treasure map comes with a bottle post and it becomes a party with the pirates. Everything is party and fun - until a new captain pops up and someone has to go on the floor .

20.title: Exen berättar allt

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: The newly arrived captain's dramatic entrance is discussed. The guy that the latest episodes of love drama has revolved around has to answer some questions about their relationships and breakups in the house. And one of the girls is responsible for their anger in the house during the pirate party.

21.title: Ovänner blir plötsligt vänner

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: One of the girls transforms the truth and toad into their own talk show, to the great annoyance of the others. A new ex comes up with a special power to control the rest of the gang, and enemies become suddenly friends in the most surprising way.

22.title: Exen berättar allt

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: Two of the participants finally confirm that they are in love. The latest section's triangle drama appears in the seams and there are lively discussions about how to turn off their emotions or not. An arrow is ready, and the participant who has the most items in the house tells who is the best lover.

23.title: Ett plötsligt avsked chockar deltagarna

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

23.plot: A sudden farewell shocks the participants and the day begins with tears. When they just started gathering the toad again - and another in the gang must say goodbye. A cozy party degenerates and one of the guys feels offended while another is sad.

24.title: Exen berättar allt

episode of.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige (TV Series 2015– )

24.plot: One participant struggled so much in the evening's section that the program time ended. Now the discussion ends - and there will be an unofficial world record in using the phrase "rejected". There will also be great drama in the studio when one of the girls is suddenly fainting.

imdb.title: Ex on the Beach Sverige
plot: Swedish version of Ex on the Beach. Eight single guys and girls head to the beach looking for love. However one by one, their idea of a holiday romance will be ruined as their ex's turn up.
